exceptions.tactic: apply is_filter_lim_unique in Hlim as Hunique.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hunique was not found in the current environment.

In environment K : AbsRing V : CompleteNormedModule K F : (V -> Prop) -> Prop H0 : forall x y : V, is_filter_lim F x -> is_filter_lim F y -> x = y l : V H : is_filter_lim F l filter_not_empty0 : F (fun _ : V => False) -> False filter_true0 : F (fun _ : V => True) filter_and0 : forall P Q : V -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : V => P x /\\ Q x) filter_imp0 : forall P Q : V -> Prop, (forall x : V, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q Unable to unify "l" with "lim (fun A : V -> Prop => forall x : V, is_filter_lim F x -> A x)".

original: intros H. unfold iota. intros Hlim. apply is_filter_lim_unique in Hlim as Hunique. rewrite Hunique. reflexivity.
